rows.label: qst100704_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm! I have received payment
of 1,000,000G in full, mo!

rows.label: qst100704_msg0002
rows.name:
I'll tear up the IOU... and
return the treasure, mo.

rows.label: qst100704_msg0003
rows.name:
Rex... I've caused you
a lot of trouble.

rows.label: qst100704_msg0005
rows.name:
Even if the reason for the
debt was to spoil your
girlfriend, I'd still help you.

rows.label: qst100704_msg0006
rows.name:
That's right! My girlfriend
at the time was so selfish...
It was tough.

rows.label: qst100704_msg0007
rows.name:
After that, I couldn't find a
new girlfriend... I've been single
for over a hundred years...

rows.label: qst100704_msg0010
rows.name:
It seems you have some problems,
but could you please take care
of them at home, mo?

rows.label: qst100704_msg0011
rows.name:
Nuinui has to use this
1,000,000G to revive the
Pignerator Trade Guild, mo!

rows.label: qst100704_msg0012
rows.name:
First, I'll put into practice what
I learned from Bahn's business
techniques: hiring cute girls, mo!
